title: Mass Effect: Andromeda - Super Deluxe Edition [v 1.09]
description:
Year: 2017
Genre: Action (Shooter), RPG, 3D, 3rd Person
Developer: BioWare
Publisher: Electronic Art
Language: Russian, English, MULTi

System requirements:
OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 (64-bit);
Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 or AMD FX-6350;
Memory: 8 GB;
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon 7850 with 2 GB of memory;
Hard disk: at least 55 GB of free space;
DirectX 11.


Release info:
Game version: 1.09
Change the language in the game settings.
Origin-Rip from Rexar
List of bonuses and additions:
Bonus for pre-order: Deep Space Armor - Looking for armor that can withstand any test in an absolutely unknown galaxy? Make pre-order and replenish your equipment armor "Deep Space".
Bonus for pre-order: a set of "Network bonuses" (multiplayer addition) - The set will accelerate your progress in the network game. Includes 5 experience amplifiers by 50%.
Bonus pre-order: appearance of the nomad - With the help of a unique case, give individuality to your "Nomad" and explore the mysterious new planets.
Everyday clothes "Pathfinder" - Nobody wants to wear a uniform around the clock. Whether you are onboard the Storm or exploring the docks, this casual outfit will help you look stylish.
Scavenger armor - Stand out from the crowd everywhere, even on the surface of deadly new worlds.
Elite weapon set for the Pathfinder (4) - Forget the standard equipment and get the elite. Make your way through Andromeda with this unique set of weapons.
Pyzhak - You know what you want. Take your space monkey on board the "Storm" and go to meet the adventure.
Exclusive helmet of the tracker "Elite helmet" Andromeda "- additional equipment for viewing all 6 training videos Andromeda Initiative.
The exclusive "Platinum" appearance of the nomad is an additional building of the "Nomad" for registration in the Andromeda Initiative.


How to install
1.Mount and install
2.Play
